definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The crown is the source of oxygen, worker of the magic of photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 树冠是氧的来源，是神奇光合作用的制造者。

sentences.english: The cake maker shakes a naked snake with the qusimilarg rake without sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用寒战的耙子摆一条赤裸的蛇。

sentences.english: There’s a difference between a telescope builder and an astronomer, of course.
sentences.chinese: 当然，望远镜的制造者和天文学家是有所不同的。

sentences.english: And the maker of the 'lovers' sculpture was one of these people.
sentences.chinese: 这件恋人雕塑的制造者，就是这些人类中的一员。

sentences.english: The cake dor shakes a naked snake dawn the quaking rake lacking sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤的蛇。

sentences.english: The cake maker all-overs a naked snake with the agitation rake without account.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者平白无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤裸的蛇。
来吧拨浪鼓它们的制造者。

sentences.english: Carmakers, two-wheeler makers must cut prices, " he siad."
sentences.chinese: 汽车生产商和两轮车制造者也必须要降低价格。

sentences.english: 'Thus sugar is good for you, ' say the sugar manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 糖类制造者说‘因此，糖是对你有好处的’。

sentences.english: Religious leaders sometimes strengthen the hand of those making pseudoscientific claims.
sentences.chinese: 宗教领袖有时候还支持了伪科学主张的制造者。

sentences.english: I don't want people to think I'm a trouble-maker.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望人们认为我是一个麻烦制造者。

sentences.english: Some people seem to be natural-born troublemakers.
sentences.chinese: 有些人似乎是天生的麻烦制造者。

sentences.english: Non-uniform wall thickness is the biggest trouble maker in plastic injection molding.
sentences.chinese: 壁厚不均是注塑成型中最大的麻烦制造者。

sentences.english: Longda Bonechina Ltd, was established in 1994 and is now the largest bonechina manufacturer in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 隆达骨质瓷有限公司，亚洲最大的骨质瓷专业制造者。

sentences.english: I have the hand of the ultimate toolmaker.
sentences.chinese: 我有一双终极的工具制造者的手。

sentences.english: China still suffers from its reputation of being a copycat manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 中国仍然受累于“山寨”仿造品制造者的声誉。

definition: malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
